## Installation

### npm/yarn
```bash
# Install globally
npm install -g vibe-cli
# or
yarn global add vibe-cli
```

### Python
```bash
# Install globally
pip install vibe-cli
```

### Shell Integration
After installing, run:
```bash
vibe-node install-alias
# or
vibe-py install-alias
```
